bug.author: masfen
bug.summary: TypeError: unicode not allowed, use send_string
bug.description: good day first off thank you for your contribution to this matter, unfortunately I am getting an error File "zmq/backend/cython/socket.pyx", line 676, in zmq.backend.cython.socket.Socket.send TypeError: unicode not allowed, use send_string could you please help me

comments.comment: Hello, this is not a problem with this code it is a zmq-lib(i think) problem post on there page.

good day first off thank you for your contribution to this matter, unfortunately I am getting an error File "zmq/backend/cython/socket.pyx", line 676, in zmq.backend.cython.socket.Socket.send TypeError: unicode not allowed, use send_string could you please help me
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/masfen>@masfen</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/blairits>@blairits</denchmark-link> , Sincere apologies for the delayed response to your queries - going forward, this repository will be actively monitored for issues/queries as they surface. We are in the process of releasing updated versions of all code concerning ZeroMQ to MetaTrader connectivity. New code releases will provide significant improvements to previous releases, and also support Python 3.6+! Stay tuned for updates üëç
